 Apology (b) is authentic by the absence of external or foreign compulsion. Conversely apology (a) is false, corrupted by external influence.

 (b) by self-revelation i.e. through the pure intercession of god himself
 
 Revelation (b) strikes a minority of people, many of whom are coincidentally locked away in institutions, with reincarnated Caesars and Napoleons. Revelation (a) afflicting the vast majority of 'believers' is as with apology by gunpoint, false. This form of belief is wholly artifical entirely fabricated / taught by impure coercion. 
 
 Ergo religion preached is religion forced. At once faith is corrupted with the preacher's first violent thump against the guardrail.
